attention.title: Attention Test
attention.description: Focus on specific targets among distractors

speech.title: Speech Analysis

description.title: Picture Description
description.instruction: Look at the image and describe what you see in detail
description.prompt: Describe this peaceful garden scene: What do you see? What colors, objects, and activities can you observe?

storytelling.title: Story Telling
storytelling.instruction: Tell a story based on the given prompt
storytelling.prompt: Tell me about a memorable day from your childhood. What happened? Who was there? How did you feel?

fluency.title: Word Fluency
fluency.instruction: Say as many words as you can that start with the given letter
fluency.prompt: Say as many words as you can that start with the letter "S". For example: sun, smile, special...

reading.title: Reading Passage
reading.instruction: Read the following passage aloud clearly and naturally
reading.prompt: The morning sun cast long shadows across the peaceful meadow. Birds chirped melodiously in the distance while a gentle breeze rustled through the leaves of the old oak tree.

recording.testMicrophone: Make sure your microphone is working and you're in a quiet environment
